articles.author: Brian Heater
articles.title: Apple’s new research robot takes a page from Pixar’s playbook - TechCrunch
articles.description: Last month, Apple offered up more insight into its consumer robotics work via a research paper that argues that traits like expressive movements are key
articles.content: Last month, Apple offered up more insight into its consumer robotics work via a research paper that argues that traits like expressive movements are key to optimizing human-robot interaction. Like mo… [+2775 chars]
